prompt: Everyone disappoints you.
Your parents think you're ugly. +1 if they argue with each other about who you take after.
Everyone share the most awkward social gathering you've been to, where you may or may not have been the social outcast. Social outcast doesn't drink.
You've once had the runs at an inopportune time.
Between you and your SO, you think one of you settled.
You recently tripped and fell embarrassingly in front of some random people.
You've accidentally sabotaged someone else's life. +1 if it wasn't an accident you evil son of a gun.
Everyone share the most brutally honest thing someone has ever told them. Most pathetically sad person doesn't drink.
Everyone you know has a better job than you.
Make up your own depressing line or story.
No one believes anything you say. No one trusts you.
No one listens to you. You constantly get ignored.
People at school, work, or home don't take you seriously and treat you like you're less than them.
People tell you that you stink or that you have bad breath.
You keep killing all of your house plants. It's pretty sad.
This is a family gathering and it's awkward as fuck.
Everyone share the worst customer service experience they've had. Worst experience doesn't drink.
This is a work party and your boss is sitting right next to you.
When little kids look at you, they get scared.
When your friends and family tries to hook you up with someone because they pity you, or because they just want to get in your business.
Peple frequently get your name wrong.
This isn't what you thought your life would be.
You're really broke right now. Send help.
You can't sleep at night.
You celebrate your birthdays alone.
Everyone share a time when they couldn't make it to the bathroom in time. The saddest moment doesn't get to drink.
You cry yourself to sleep at night.
You disappoint yourself.
You don't have a job.
You don't have anyone to seriously share your problems with.
Everyone share a time when someone you were with did something that embarrassed you. Most embarrassed person doesn't drink. +1 if you pretended not to know them.
You don't know what to do in life.
You don't trust anyone.
You expect too much from yourself.
You feel as if you have to wear a mask all the time, and pretend that you're someone you aren't, or that you're happier than you really are.
You feel as if you're a fake.
You feel as if, no matter how hard you've tried, it's just not enough. Honestly though, keep trying man. Don't let life win.
Everyone share their worst family gathering experience ever. Worst experience doesn't drink.
You feel inadequate compared to everyone else.
You get anxiety just walking out of the house.
You get anxiety talking to other people.
You hate people. Period.
You hate your boss.
You hate your job.
You hate yourself.
You alone have at least 3 cats. Hopefully they don't ignore you like everyone else.
You have a deep, dark, secret that you can't tell anyone or else it will majorly fuck up your life.
You have a lot of friends, but let's be honest. You can't rely on any of them for shit. Everyone is a fucking disappointment. The whole lot.
You have an STD.
You have debt.
You have never been in a relationship. AKA, single since birth...
You have no friends.
You just flunked out of college, high school, or life.
Make up your own depressing line or story.
You just lost a lot of money gambling or investing.
You just want to run away from everything.
You look 12. Actual 12 year olds look better than you.
You only have one friend.
You recently broke up or got divorced.
You recently farted in a quiet room full of people.
You recently threw up in front of a lot of important people.
You screwed up on a school or work project.
You secretly hate all of your coworkers.
You secretly hate your best friend.
You swear someone's out to get you.
Everyone share their worst pickup experience, whether you were being hit on or were hitting on someone else. Worst experience doesn't drink.
You think you chose the wrong major or career path.
You think you're ugly.
You want to move out of your parents place, but you can't because you're too poor.
You were forced to play this game.
You were out of the closet, but went back in at some point.
You were supposed to confess to someone but chickened out at the last second.
Sometimes, you wish you were never born. I hope you're doing better.
You're an alcoholic. Please leave this game.
You're family expects too much from you.
You're getting paid less than you deserve.
You've just been kicked out of your parent's house.
You're in a one sided crush.
You're lonely as fuck. So lonely...
Your peers often ignore you at school or work.
Somebody keeps stealing your lunch, and you haven't found that motherfucker yet.
Make up your own depressing line or story.
You're pregnant. You might be happy, but it's not gonna be an easy 9 months. Why are you playing this game? No drinking for you.
You're secretly in love with someone you can't have.
You're socially awkward.
You're still sober. I guess you're the designated driver.
You're the black sheep of the family.
Everyone share a time where they got into an 'at the wrong place at the wrong time' kind of situation.
You're the friend who always gets stuck with the tab.
People think your SO could've done better. +1 if they get surprised when they find out who you're dating or is married to.
You're either going bald or that receding hairline is starting to make your forehead look big.
You thought you had a nice thing going with someone, but they suddenly ghosted you and you don't know why.
You're the only one without a SO or not married.
Everyone share your most failed love confession. Worst confessor doesn't drink.
You're treated differently because of your age, gender, sexuality, religion, ethnicity, skin color, health, etc.
You've accidentally screwed up a relationship with someone, and now you don't know how to say sorry and get them back.
You've been scammed.
You've been screwed over by a friend.
You've done the walk of shame.
You've just been rejected from a job. Or maybe a lot of jobs.
You've switched majors or careers one too many times.
Your ex is here.
Your family has disowned you.
Your friends or family pretend to not know you in public.
Your family thinks you're an idiot.
Your mom is your only friend.
Your parents don't even know how old you are.
Your SO cheated on you.
Your tinder date never showed up.
Your tinder profile is a picture of someone else.
Everyone share your worst date. Worst date doesn't drink.
You recently told a joke and nobody laughed.
Someone recently forced you to work out, but you just want to be a couch potato.
Aunt Flo just paid you a visit, and she a bitch.
You've accidentally walked out of the store with something without paying. +1 if it wasn't an accident.
You have a lot of hair and it's not the good kind. Too much hair. Everywhere. You a hairy beast.
Everyone share the most disgusting and grossest thing they have ever been forced to eat. The one whose taste buds were most abused doesn't get to drink.
You once trashed talked someone behind their back only to find out that they were actually there and heard everything.
You once got into a fight. And you lost. Big time. It still bothers you 'till this day.
Everyone share a time when they accidentally sent an email or text to the wrong person. Worst accident doesn't drink.
